lead_paragraph: Twin eruptions from the Calbuco volcano in southern Chile have sent vast clouds of ash into the sky, causing concern.

headline.print_headline: The Americas; Chile: Volcano Spews Dangerous Ash

snippet: Twin eruptions from the Calbuco volcano in southern Chile have sent vast clouds of ash into the sky, causing concern.
abstract: Calbuco volcano in Chile erupts for second time, leaving many concerned about possibility of water contamination, respiratory illness and more grounded flights.
